Title: 你可能不知道的3个Instagram实用小功能，第三个特别有趣

Content.Knowledge Point: You can customize the appearance and functionality of links in Instagram stories.
Content.Text: First, find your content, tap the link sticker, and type in your original URL. Then, use the customizer to add a specific URL and even include emojis for better engagement.

Content.Knowledge Point: Ensure your link is clickable by adding action phrases like 'tap for promotion' or 'sign up for newsletter'.
Content.Text: Adjust the link's position and wording to make it more appealing and user-friendly.

Content.Knowledge Point: Instagram allows you to save posts for later viewing or organization.
Content.Text: To save a post, tap the bookmark icon. You can add it to a collection or create a new one. Saved posts can be accessed from the 'save' section in your profile.

Content.Knowledge Point: Saves are useful for creating mood boards, collecting inspiration, and organizing content.
Content.Text: This feature is particularly helpful for beginners in content creation, allowing them to curate and save various types of media.
